paramInformation.label: Output Type
paramInformation.description: Define the output type

options.label: Direct Load Control or Normally Open Relay

paramInformation.label: Startup Output Level
paramInformation.description: Define the output level on startup

paramInformation.label: Off Timeout
paramInformation.description: Time after which the output will be switched Off

paramInformation.label: On Timeout
paramInformation.description: Time after which the output will be switched On

paramInformation.label: Up Power Local Control
paramInformation.description: The value used to control the integrated relay in case of Up Power Event.

paramInformation.label: Down Power Local Control
paramInformation.description: The value used to control the integrated relay in case of Down Power Event

paramInformation.label: Meter Type
paramInformation.description: Defines how positive and negative power is treated

options.label: As Is (The device is connected in a bidirectional system and you want to measure consumed and produced energy)
Negative Value Is Considered 0 (The device is connected in a bidirectional system, but you are interested only in consumed energy)
Positive Value Is Considered 0 (The device is connected in a bidirectional system, but you are interested only in produced energy)
All Values Are Considered Positive (The device is connected in a system that only consumes Energy)
All Values Are Considered Negative (The device is connected in a system that only produces Energy)

paramInformation.label: Current Transformer Type
paramInformation.description: Define the model of current transformer connected to the device

paramInformation.label: Up Power Remote Control
paramInformation.description: The value used to control Up Power Group

paramInformation.label: Down Power Remote Control
paramInformation.description: The value used to control Down Power Group

paramInformation.label: Over Voltage Limit
paramInformation.description: Define the Over Voltage Limit

paramInformation.label: Down Voltage Limit
paramInformation.description: Define the Down Voltage Limit

paramInformation.label: Up Power Level
paramInformation.description: Sets the level beyond which time of permanence above this level is calculated

paramInformation.label: Up Power Type
paramInformation.description: Defines if the Up Power is consumed or produced

paramInformation.label: Up Power First Timeout
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence above the Up power level after which the First Up Power event occurs

paramInformation.label: Up Power Next Timeout
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence above the Up power level after which the Next Up Power event occurs

paramInformation.label: Down Power Level
paramInformation.description: Sets the level beyond which time of permanence below this level is calculated

paramInformation.label: Down Power Type
paramInformation.description: Defines if the Down Power is consumed or produced

paramInformation.label: Down Power First Timeout
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence below the Down Power level after which the first Down Power event occurs

paramInformation.label: Down Power Next Timeout
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence below the Down Power level after which the next Up Down event occurs

paramInformation.label: Protection Time
paramInformation.description: Define the minimum time after which an Up/Down Power Event can be triggered again

paramInformation.label: Meter Report Max Delay
paramInformation.description: The Maximum Time after which the next Meter sequence report will be sent

paramInformation.label: Meter Instant Report
paramInformation.description: Power change from the last sent report that triggers a new meter report sequence

options.label: No Report Is Sent for Any Power Change

paramInformation.label: Report Config
paramInformation.description: Define which Report scale will be sent. If you want to receive more than 1 scale, the value for the configuration parameter is the sum of the event values
